text.text_translated: "Wonder" is the first novel by RJ Palacio, who lives in New York. On her website, she explains that the idea for the book came to her after seeing a girl with a face that looked different on the street one day. Wonder has been a **bestseller** (a very popular book that sells a lot) in the United States and has already won many awards. Many schools are now using it as a starting point for **discussions** (talks) about **bullying** (being unkind to others), **friendship** (being good friends), and what it's like to be different. A film **version** (a film) of the book is being made, and many, including me, are waiting with excitement to see what RJ Palacio writes next.
